      • getCategories

        public final java.util.List<ProductFeedCategory> getCategories(java.lang.String merchantUrl,
                                                java.lang.Integer merchantId)
        Here the list of categories are scrapped based on the merchantId and merchantUrl after the category details like category name,categoryId,categoryUrl along with merchantId are stored in productfeedCategory table in the database if any exception is caught it throws error and return productfeedCategories. Return list of categories from future bazaar.
        Parameters:
        merchantUrl - String merchantUrl
        merchantId - Integer merchantId
        Returns:
        List
